item.title: Shell Basics
item.description: Introduction We will be covering the basics of the linux commandline. The author will be creating the tutorial with Zsh but all commands here should work with most POSIX shells. The prompt Files Files are things like Directories Say we wanted to create a directory called 1 mkdir <directory name> We can then move into the directy with
